evidence: The setup uses a series of gratings - a source grating, a phase grating, and an analyzer grating
And they achieved beautiful soft-tissue visualization, something you simply can't get from normal X-ray attenuation imaging.
...they achieved beautiful soft-tissue visualization, something you simply can’t get from normal X-ray attenuation imaging.
It’s a big step forward for optical-X-ray fusion, because now the X-ray side of the hybrid system provides much richer anatomical detail to guide and constrain the optical reconstruction.

triples.evidence: scanned small animals - typically mice - sometimes for an entire day, to acquire very high-quality data
